childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation (QF) hosted the President of of Ghana, His Excellency President John Dramani Mahama, as part of his three-day state visit to Qatar.

President Mahama’s visit was aimed at enhancing bilateral relations between Qatar and Ghana to increase cooperation between the two countries.

The Ghanaian Head of State and his delegation were welcomed to Qatar Foundation Visitor’s Centre by Engineer Jassim Telefat, Group Executive Director of Qatar Foundation Capital Projects and Facilities Management.

President Mahama was then introduced to QF through a comprehensive presentation that detailed the many educational initiatives, scientific research programs and community development plans being undertaken by the Foundation and its centers.

Following the presentation, the delegation from West Africa was shown a large 3D scale model of QF’s educational and research buildings in addition to future construction projects at Qatar Foundation.

For the full story, please click here.
